Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is a non-conference matchup between New York Knicks and Houston Rockets.
Others: The Knicks are 3-2 in the Eastern Conference, while the Rockets are 3-3 in the Western Conference.
The Rockets averaged 7.8 steals, 4.6 blocks and 12.2 turnovers per game last season.
The Knicks averaged 16.7 points off of turnovers, 16.3 second-chance points and 28.4 bench points last season.
Rockets: Steven Adams is day to day (knee).
Knicks: Precious Achiuwa is out (hamstring), Mitchell Robinson is out (ankle).
